data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance for raising Capital through SME exchange - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides benefits upto 30% expenditure incurred on raising of equity capital through SME exchange maximum up to Rs 5 lakhs
data.eligibility: Enterprises involved in manufacturing (MSMEs) having Udyog Aadhaar/Udyam registration
data.conditions:
1. Application should be for raising equity through SME Exchange for the enterprise to be setup in Gujarat.
  2. Enterprise shall have to apply within one year from the listing date in SME Exchange
  3. MSME status of enterprise will be considered on the date of listing in SME Exchange
data.beneficiaries:
1. All Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
  2. Manufacturing & Service activities will be eligible under this scheme.
  3. The enterprise which is registered in Gujarat, must have at least one manufacturing Unit / Service Unit in Gujarat.
  4. Enterprise should be successfully raised capital through SME Exchange during the operative period of the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Application should be for raising equity through SME Exchange for the enterprise to be setup in Gujarat.
  2. Enterprise shall have to apply within one year from the listing date in SME Exchange
  3. MSME status of enterprise will be considered on the date of listing in SME Exchange
data.context: The primary mission of The Industrial Policy 2020 includes support for development of MSMEs., focus on Export Competitiveness: Vocal for Local to become Global and thus integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To encourage MSME to opt for raising equity capital through SME exchange
data.description:
1. For SC/ST Enterprise, 30% of Eligible expenditure incurred on raising of fund through SME Exchange maximum up to Rs.5 Lakhs (Rupees Five Lakhs) one time after successful raising of equity & Listing on SME Exchange Platform during the operative period of the scheme.
  2. Following expenditure would be eligible for assistance:
    • SME Exchange Fees and other Expenses
    • Charges by Registrar to the issue
    • Charges of lead managers of the issue
    • SEBI registered merchant banker charges
    • RTA Fees, CDSL and NSDL fees & other expenses.
    • Prospectus & IPO form Printing charges
    • Advertising & Market Making fees Expenses
    • ROC & Ministry of Corporate affairs.
data.how_to_apply: The enterprise must have to apply in prescribed form as per Annexure along with self-attested complete documents as per Check List Annexure to MSME Commissioner office & IFP online portal.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: After successful raising of equity & Listing on SME Exchange Platform during the operative period of the scheme.
data.additional_info:
Gujarat Venture Finance Limited may take equity in enterprise which are registered with SME Exchange.
The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed Prescribed Application Form* 
2. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Copy of the Constitution of Enterprise (Memorandum & Articles of Association) 
4. Copy of SME Exchange Registration Listing related letter by BSE/NSE/SME Exchange 
5. Copy of GST Registration 
6. Copy of Public Issue Boucher/prospectus 
7. Expenditure Statement on Letter Head (CA Certified) 
8. CA Certificate regarding MSME status (as per MSMED act-2006 as on listing date) 
9. Audited Balance Sheet of last financial year 
10. CA Certificate of expenditure statement (for equity raise through SME Exchange with total and subtotal Head wise) 
11. Payment Highlighted bank statement 
12. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approvals (if applicable) 
13. Latest Electricity Bill 
14. Cancelled Cheque of the Enterprise 
15. Copy of Pan card of the Enterprise and Promoters/partners/directors, and Authorised Signatory 
16. Supporting documents for SC/ST Enterprise 
17. Board Resolution regarding Authorized Signatory
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
Jadeja Dharmendrasinh, 
Commissioner of Industries (MSME Incentive),
4th Floor, Block No. 1, Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11, 
Gandhinagar-382010

For other addresses visit- https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/districtindustrieslist

data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
